Reference

All functions

Add Leanpub as Collaborator

Check Leanpub Course

Check for expected file structure and create missing

Starting a Course, Light wrapper for make_course

Create PDF and PNGs from Google Slides

Create a Lesson

create_videos()

Create video from script and PNGs

flag_code_chunks()

Flag Code Chunks

gs_ari() gs_ari_spin() gs_tts()

Convert Google Slides and notes to video with ari

gs_ari_upload()

Convert Google Slides to Video and Upload to YouTube

gs_convert()

Convert Google Slides to PNGs and a script

gs_folder_df()

Get Google Folder Contents IDs

gs_id_from_slide() get_image_link_from_slide() get_image_from_slide()

Google Slides Helper Functions

gs_slide_code()

Get Slide Code from Google Slides

gs_slide_df() notes_from_slide() gs_notes_from_slide() notes_from_slide_output() gs_get_slides() gs_speaker_notes_id() gs_replace_notes()

Get Google Slide Elements IDs

gs_to_drive_pngs()

Convert Google Slides to PNGs and Upload to Drive folder

gs_upload_pptx() gs_pptx_to_pdf()

Convert PPTX to Google Slides (and then PDF)

install_ffmpeg()

Install ffmpeg from a command line installer

is_language_auth() didactr_gl_auth()

Is Google Language API Authorized

leanpub_parse_quiz() leanpub_parse_exercise() leanpub_remove_quiz() leanpub_remove_exercise() leanpub_remove_tests()

Render Leanpub document

n_pdf_pages()

Count number of pages in PDF

pdf_to_images()

Convert PDF to Other Images using ImageMagick

Rename set of PNGs to Google Slide IDs

Upload script to Google Slide Deck Notes

strip_manuscript()

Strip Markdown from Manuscript

Summary of course check

translate_course()
